page.title: 15WHAT CORRINGHAM NEEDS
page.content: { CORRINGHAM TOWN CENTRE}IS USED A LOT.PEOPLE THINK IT IS VERY CONVENIENT,BUT SOME CHILDREN THINK IT COULD BE IMPROVED IN SOME WAYS. MOST OF THE CHILDREN THINK A{YOUTH {CLUB}WOULD BE GOOD BECAUSE THERE IS NOTHING FOR THE CHILDREN BETWEEN THE AGES OF 7 AND 13 YEARS.IN THE{YOUTH {CLUB}THERE COULD BE SNOOKER TABLES, TABLE TENNIS,DISCOS, AMUSMENTS AND FILMS.YOU SHOULD PAY A FEE AT THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR AND YOU ARE ALLOWED TO USE ANYTHING FOR THAT YEAR. ALSO A{FAST FOOD}SHOP WOULD BE APPRECIATED BECAUCE ALL WE HAVE IN CORRINGHAM TOWN IS A CHINESE AND AN INDIAN RESTAURANT. WE WOULD LIKE SOME CLEANER{TOILETS BECAUSE THE ONES WE HAVE ARE VERY DIRTY AND HAVE GRAFFITI ON THE WALLS.
